reviews.review:
If you want the tl;dr, this game is fun only if you play with friends. Alone, especially as a killer, this game is a terrible frustraition fest which even in winning which makes it incredibly unenjoyable. 

This review is from a rank one killers perspective, i wanted to reach that rank to see if playstyles and the way the game felt changed at all and to make sure i have useful experience to draw upon. 

I want to address a common problem with this game, which is people who always claim either killers use scummy tactics or survivors do, through their actions. I believe this problem is in how the game is set up. 

The problem is blood points are meaningless to a killer who wants to pip (win), the kill is all that matters. While playing survivor, you only need to gain enough points to win which are earned in numerous ways, and often enough if one has enough experience, they will almost always pip even if they die. Now how is this a problem though? I believe this is due to survivor perks vs the killer perks in terms of abilities in what each can do. Currently, survivors have numerous perks to prevent them being hooked and killed for the killers pip, while the killer has no real way to prevent or even counter these. Yes the killer can focus down a single survivor and even has the potential to kill all the survivors, but this doesn't rely on the killers play style. It relies on the survivors.


Everything the killer does can be countered by the survivors (not that this is a bad thing!), even if the killer camps. That killer will lose if the survivors all scatter and do gens instead of being alteristic. Yes one person's out of luck, but the killer will lose for only killing one or even two people without additional hooks, so if the survivors give him no inscentive to stay around the hook they're almost garrenteed to leave to pursue the pip. You cannot blame a killer for doing a tactic which works after all, such as camping if it gets them more kills when the survivors already could have countered him. 

This is before you even take into account crutch perks like borrowed time and decisive strike, things which make the killers day frustraiting and gives the survivors zero reason to fear the killer. Why be scared of a killer you can always escape from? This is what makes it bad. As already stated above, survivors have ample ways already of beating a killer, now they have ways which are simply easier and remove any respect to the killer. 

Now these abilities on their own wouldn't be too bad either, if the very game wasn't already set up in a way which gives survivors ample ability to avoid and escape killers through pallets which allow you to stun a killer, pallets which form loops allowing survivors to kite a killer for extreme amounts of time providing ample time for generators to be repaired. 

And in the end this encourages a loop. Because killers are forced to use tactics like slugging, camping, and just letting people bleed out which of course isn't enjoyable for a survivor. But what are his options? Pick up a survivor and get decisive striked. Hook a survivor, get borrowed time. Leave a survivor for a few seconds on a hook and immediantly they're taken off by survivors with no respect or fear for the killer. So the killer plays a bit scummy to secure his kill and the survivors who prefer high altrisism are forced to take scummy perks to counter it because they don't learn any other way - like actual stealth and doing other generators to lure killers away from their hook victims. It has gotten to the point that tracking perks on a killer, are rarely scene beyond nurses calling which allows one to see injured survivors healing, because finding a survivor isn't a problem for an experienced killer. Killing them? that is at times, almost impossible.

And this is before you even find a group using coms as well. I remember reading a comment of a person saying "why don't they make a seperate que for killers who want to play against survive with friends?" The answer? No killer would ever play it. 


In the end, i will say this. The game is not fun for a killer at the moment. It seems almost every patch a good killer perk or add on, or combination thereof, is being nerfed. And it seems like the survivors never recieve such treatment. For a asymmetrical game, the killer feels like they lack the power they should and the survivors have too much, allowing them to control the flow of the game and show no fear to a killer they are almost individually stronger then when it comes to wasting the killers time management and winning through sheer distraction. A game where one survivor good enough with enough map knowledge (and a few lucky pallet spawns) can completely pip and potentially escape, beating the killer who has been chasing them since the start just because their own perks allow them to disrepect any danger the killer might have posed.

I really enjoy playing this game! It's always more fun with friends. Survivors are very strong atm though. Killers don't always have a good time with all the SWF squads. It is a fun game though! I recommend buying it with a couple of friends and starting of with playing some Kill your friends for learning how both killers and survivors work (:

Best played with friends. Overall it's a great game but not scary.

I used to watch on twitch then i decided to get a year later for 10 bux on sale. i love this game. i play survivor and went from being the first killed and blowing skill chex left and right to now actually surviving and hitting all my skill checks and I'm even escaping the killer once in a while. Game is still occasionally scary... esp with Myers creeping around.  Game gets updated a lot which is the main draw as the play styles are always changing and you arent pigeon holed into just one build. several builds are effective...although only 25% of the perks are even worth using.  75% of the perks need to be reworked and game would be great.. sooo many perks go unused and people stick to only 10ish perks.  fun and spooky hiding from killer. its 3rd person as survivor and first person as killer.  I tried killer and didnt find it fun so survivor it is. I recommend this game...esp for the 10 dollar entry fee.   game is simple yet complex and fun hide and go seek type horror game with a great lineup of killers which is always growing.  As long as they keep adding material i will keep playing this game. i just wish they would rework the majority of the useless perks. fun game though, esp after a couple hundred hours and u hit every skill check.  Best DBD Streamers are Ur2eztv, 72hours, sxy, pug, and slickfoo. ALSO THE DEVS KEEP UPDATING THE GAME WHICH KEEPS IT RELEVANT....just when u think ur tired of dbd a new patch drops. Game keeps improving and adding. I enjoy it and appreciate the constant updates!

No importa que termines muerto si antes lograste escaparte del Asesino varias veces, aturdirlo, rescatar gente de los ganchos, curar y demas. Si hiciste lo suficiente ya vas subiendo y eso esta genial.

This game continues to be a toxic pile of trash. They introduce new maps quite frequently yet the most you'll ever usually get is mcc estates or swamp and maybe 1 other trash one if you're lucky.

I have only gotten the newest map once in 3 days of over 10 hours of gameplay a day.. All the other maps have been mcc estates or some other trash common one.

I NEVER get the saloon map unless I use a offering for it.
Never get red forest.
Never get the crow map.

Fix your trash map system, people don't want to play 1 or 2 maps for years and years, it's get BORING especially mixed with your infidel playerbase.

I pretty much only play this game with friends, and I mostly recommend playing this game with just friends. If not, your teammates will be extremely stupid, never save you, or make the connection terrible. If you have a whole party, there's a pretty good chance that even the killer will make the match terrible.

If all connections are good, this game is extremely fun to play!
es un buen juego, pero los caperos y tuneleros matan al juego, pero el juego en si es espectacular

Very adicting, easy to learn yet hard to master. If youre lookign for a spooky game this will give you many jumpscares and mini heart-attacks. 
For some people though, it could get very repetitive and boring. 
Give it a shot and see if the game is for you.

I strongly recommend the game. 

Now the bad, the engine in which the game was built on is not very good in low-powered computers. In other words, If your computer is 'not very strong'/or 'a non gamer laptop', you will not enjoy the game completely. You will have to reduce the quality a lot and you'll be playing something like  *minecraft by daylight*.

SERIOUSLY THOUGH. THE DEVELOPERS SHOULD MAKE THE GAME LESS EXIGENT WITH THE REQUIREMENTS.

Un buen juego con sus Pro y Contras, este juego puede llegar a ser adictivo si deseas lograr a objetivos especificos como subir de nivel un personaje en especifico. la comunidad por otra parte es un punto medio, pueden tocarte jugadores toxicos sean supervivientes al inistir con trollear , pero al perder volverse realmente molestos (se llevan y no la aguantan). De igual manera jugadores asesinos campers o muy buenos en ambos casos la gente se quejara de ellos. Juego recomendado con moderacion y sin tomar importancia a los demas jugadores
mmmmuuuuuiiittoooo bom ( jogo extremamente satisfatorio , viciante , gostoso de jogar, aperfei√ßoamento de mecanica )

At first I was quite skeptical of getting this game because I heard it gets tedious after a while but when I played it, I enjoyed every second. I personally don't like playing this by myself so I recommend that you play it with friends because it's much more fun that way in my opinion. Occasionally you'll get killers who do some stupid camping bullshit to win which is unfair as fuck but other than that I think this game is actually a lot of fun and I definitely recommend it!
